remarks: A polynomial is a polynomial over all larger index sets.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Jun-2015.)
statement:
mzpresrename $p |- ( ( W e. _V /\ V C_ W /\ F e. ( mzPoly ` V ) ) -> ( x e. ( ZZ ^m W ) |-> ( F ` ( x |` V ) ) ) e. ( mzPoly ` W ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
